doc.title: Copyleft

value.content: Copyleft is a term, usually referring to a license, used to indicate that such license requires that redistribution of said work is subject to the same license as the original. Examples of copyleft licenses are the GNU GPL (for software) and the Creative Commons SA (Share Alike) licenses (for works of art).
